name: Singularity Cleanup Squad
description:
Made for the OGAM #11

---

The Organization has tasked you, Head Commander, to pacify the Voidspace once more. Organize your agents, build your defenses, and fight against eldritch, ethereal entities that seek to bring armageddon in our side of the universe to stabilize Voidspace and protect both the interests of the Organization and mankind itself.

Features:

  • Procedural map generation: No two games are the same!
  • Minimalist pixel art graphics: The space-like feel and look is fueled mostly by black and white, with a bit of color and glow.
  • Fog of war: The void isn't an easy sea to navigate, and WILL contain many dangers.
  • Gradually intensifying waves. Find and stabilize the origin of the anomalies before you become overwhelmed!

Notes:

  • For some reason, the game breaks down entirely on the non-debug export. Some research reveals that this isn't an error of mine but an engine bug. I hope you don't mind the command prompt in the background.
  • Due to an unexpected event, I had to submit this early. Please forgive me for the lack of polish or overlooked bugs
  • To win, destroy that thing with a stabilizer.
